itunes:title: Advent Week 4 with Nathan Tasker
title: Advent Week 4 with Nathan Tasker
description:
For Christmas Week, Amanda and Raechel welcome back to the podcast Nathan Tasker, Director of Music, Liturgy, and Creative Arts at Christ Presbyterian Church. As the three revisit the Christmas story, they challenge themselves to read it again with fresh eyes. Join them as they continue to discuss the theme of light in the miraculous story of God coming to dwell among us. 


Read with Us: 

This episode corresponds to Week 4 of the She Reads Truth Advent 2021: The Everlasting Light reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com. 

Shop the She Reads Truth Advent 2021: The Everlasting Light collection at ShopSheReadsTruth.com. 

Show notes can be found at shereadstruth.com/podcast/advent-week-4-with-nathan-tasker
